function.name: show_group
function.description: Show a group of original data points filtered by some features. Presents the original data points only. Can de used to display a sub-selection of the dataset.

indoor_temperature_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of indoor temperature

indoor_temperature_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of outdoor temperature

outdoor_temperature_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of outdoor temperature

outdoor_temperature_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of outdoor temperature

past_electricity_min.description: Filter dataset by the minimum value of past electricity

past_electricity_max.description: Filter dataset by the maximum value of past electricity
